subsection.name: Looking for support or want to propose an enhancement for the dozer Framework?
subsection.p: For community support or dozer enhancement requests check out the Support Forums . We value your enhancement suggestions and want to build something of value to the Java community. When submitting bug and feature requests, it is really helpful if you are able to submit a simplified unit test case(s) that reproduce the issue. We understand this is not possible for every request, but if you are able to submit a unit test it usually results in the request being implemented sooner.

subsection.name: Think you've found a bug?
subsection.p: Please enter a bug in the bug tracker . We value your support there. We can't fix bugs we don't know about!

subsection.name: Have a feature request?
subsection.p:
Please enter a feature request in the
feature request tracker
. It helps if you attach a patch :)

subsection.name: Got a patch?
subsection.p:
Please submit a patch in the
patch tracker
. Along with your patch we need a unit test and any supporting objects and mapping file.
